title: 求助dalao-制作boss-帮忙弄下-快点戳进来吧o(>﹏<)o
txt_content:
制作BOSS-求帮忙


指令如下：
<font size="3">/summon Skeleton ~ ~1 ~ {SkeletonType:1,CustomName:"核心守卫者",CustomNameVisible:1,PersistenceRequired:1b,Equipment:[{id:iron_sword,Count:1,Damage:3,Damage:0S,tag:{AttributeModifiers:[{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:1,UUIDMost:1,Amount:6,AttributeName:generic.attackDamage,Name:G}],display:{Name:"鞘·起始物",Lore:["守护☆轮回之切"]},ench:[{id:20,lvl:1},{id:21,lvl:2},{id:19,lvl:1},{id:18,lvl:2},{id:0,lvl:5}],StoredEnchantments:[{id:20,lvl:1},{id:21,lvl:2},{id:19,lvl:1},{id:18,lvl:2},{id:0,lvl:5}]}},{id:minecraft:leather_boots,Count:1,Damage:3,Damage:0S,tag:{ench:[{id:7,lvl:1}],StoredEnchantments:[{id:7,lvl:1}]}},{id:minecraft:iron_leggings,Count:1,Damage:3,Damage:0S,tag:{ench:[{id:7,lvl:1}],StoredEnchantments:[{id:7,lvl:1}]}},{id:minecraft:golden_chestplate,Count:1,Damage:3,Damage:0S,tag:{ench:[{id:7,lvl:1}],StoredEnchantments:[{id:7,lvl:1}]}},{id:skull,Count:1,Damage:3,Damage:0S}],DropChances:[1f,0f,0f,0f,0f],Attributes:[{Name:generic.attackDamage,Base:3},{Name:generic.maxHealth,Base:45}]}</font>复制代码帮忙添加一个头盔[头颅/有图片资源]进去

头颅指令
[size=3]/give @p skull 1 3 {display:{Name:"Elder Guardian"},SkullOwner:{Id:"e56a8749-8a4a-40cc-9ded-3c90f8ae8c63",Properties:{textures:[{Value:"eyJ0ZXh0dXJlcyI6eyJTS0lOIjp7InVybCI6Imh0dHA6Ly90ZXh0dXJlcy5taW5lY3JhZnQubmV0L3RleHR1cmUvMWM3OTc0ODJhMTRiZmNiODc3MjU3Y2IyY2ZmMWI2ZTZhOGI4NDEzMzM2ZmZiNGMyOWE2MTM5Mjc4YjQzNmIifX19"}]}}}[/size]复制代码帮忙把头颅添加进去,我要做个BOSS,需要这个头颅当头盔，BOSS指令在前面,
帮忙把这个头颅头盔添加进去，感觉不尽O(∩_∩)O


本人新手，不会添加花括号什么的,根本一点也不了解，所以添加进去也需要弄些括号，本人也不会弄这些括号，所以拜托你们帮帮忙，个人急做海岛QAQ


求答案-(づ￣ 3￣)づ：

replies.author: free8605
replies.txt_content:
